test-set.name: method-html
test-set.description: Tests for the Serialization method HTML

test-case.name: Serialization-html-1
test-case.description: Test that HTML 4.0 elements with empty content model are serialized using only a start tag

modified.change: added dependency inline with bug issue #21868

test-case.name: Serialization-html-2
test-case.description: Test that HTML 5.0 elements with empty content model are serialized using only a start tag

modified.change: added dependency inline with bug issue #21868

test-case.name: Serialization-html-3
test-case.description: Test that elements in the XHTML namespace whose local names match those of HTML 4.0 elements with empty content model are serialized as XML

modified.change: Added alternative result. See bug issue #21968
added dependency inline with bug issue #21868

test-case.name: Serialization-html-4
test-case.description: Test that elements in the XHTML namespace whose local names match those of HTML 5.0 elements with empty content model are serialized using only a start tag

modified.change: added dependency inline with bug issue #21868
isindex and frame removed (implementation-defined, see 7.1)

test-case.name: Serialization-html-5
test-case.description: Test serialization of XML islands for HTML 4.0

test-case.name: Serialization-html-6
test-case.description: Test serialization of XML islands for HTML 5.0

test-case.name: Serialization-html-7
test-case.description: Test serialization of unknown elements in no namespace for HTML 5.0

test-case.name: Serialization-html-8
test-case.description: Test serialization of unknown elements in no namespace or in the XHTML namespace for HTML 5.0

test-case.name: Serialization-html-9
test-case.description: Test that no escaping is performed for text node descendants or attributes of same in the script and style elements

test-case.name: Serialization-html-10
test-case.description: Verify HTML elements are recognized regardless of case

test-case.name: Serialization-html-11
test-case.description: Verify that an ampersand in an attribute value is not escaped if it is immediately followed by a left brace

test-case.name: Serialization-html-12
test-case.description: Verify boolean attributes in HTML 4.0 are serialized in minimized form only if the name and value match, without regard to case

test-case.name: Serialization-html-13
test-case.description: Verify boolean attributes in HTML 5.0 are serialized in minimized form only if the name and value match, without regard to case

test-case.name: Serialization-html-14
test-case.description: Test the effect of the indent serialization parameter with value yes

test-case.name: Serialization-html-15
test-case.description: Test the effect of the indent serialization parameter with value no

test-case.name: Serialization-html-16
test-case.description: Test the effect of the suppress-indentation serialization parameter if the indent parameter has value yes

test-case.name: Serialization-html-17
test-case.description: Test the effect of the suppress-indentation serialization parameter if the indent parameter has value no

test-case.name: Serialization-html-18
test-case.description: Test with cdata-section-elements for HTML 4.0

modified.change: added dependency inline with bug issue #21868
correct expected result

result.serialization-matches: No CDATANo CDATANo CDATANo CDATA
